amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to the Charging and Fueling Infrastructure Discretionary Grant Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
